string.text: Pirate sails spotted on the horizon! Your crew prepares for combat as the enemy vessel closes in. Your prisoners could be used as hostages, or they might need to help defend the ship if the situation becomes desperate.

Dense fog rolls in, reducing visibility to almost nothing. You could press forward using your navigation skills, wait it out safely, or risk having prisoners navigate using their knowledge of these waters.
Wait for the fog to clear.
Your ship encounters a merchant vessel in distress. They offer valuable cargo in exchange for assistance. However, your prisoners might slow the rescue operation, and some cargo appears suspicious.
Help them and take the reward.
